tasks.task: ** Install irrigation system in a high tunnel
subtasks: Assemble header pipe
Position pipe near water tower
Connect two-inch lay flat pipe to water tower
Install 90-degree elbow to direct pipe towards the end of the high tunnel
Attach three-quarter inch poly pipe at the tunnel's end
Apply hose clamps to secure connections
Connect garden hose adapter for initial testing
Demonstrate the use of agricultural tools like channel locks and Teflon tape
Explain the components of the medium-sized irrigation system from Dripworks
Briefly show the process of terminating drip tape ends using foldback and Gorilla tape
Diagnose limitations and plan for future irrigation setup completion

tasks.task: Install irrigation system in high tunnel
subtasks: Lay header pipe towards water tower
Install 90-degree elbow at connection point
Attach three-quarters inch poly pipe to header pipe
Secure connections with clamps and Teflon tape
Connect garden hose adapter for testing
Explain Dripworks components (filter, pressure regulators)
Demonstrate drip tape end termination techniques
Introduce Bluetooth irrigation controller (planned next video)
Address limitations and plan for next installment

tasks.task: Install irrigation system in high tunnel
Assemble irrigation system for high tunnel
subtasks: Lay out and connect two-inch header pipe to water tower
Install 90-degree fitting to divert pipe toward tunnel end
Connect three-quarter inch poly pipe to header pipe at end
Secure pipe connections with clamps and proper sealing
Connect garden hose for testing the irrigation setup
